metadata.title: CVE-2023-39443 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple out-of-bounds write vulnerabilities exist in the LXT2 parsingfunctionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially-crafted .lxt2 file can leadto arbitrary code execution. A victim would need to open a malicious fileto trigger these vulnerabilities.This vulnerability concerns theout-of-bounds write perfomed by the prefix copy loop.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
